result.title: Lost your Bone?
result.content: Don't worry if you've forgotten your password, we all do it sometimes. Resetting is quick and easy.

result.title: What do I do?
result.content:
Enter your username and the email address you used when you created the account.
We'll send a code to this email which will allow you to reset your password!

Already have a code? Click Here
